official-title.#text:
Authorizing the use of Emancipation Hall in
		  the Capitol Visitor Center for a ceremony honoring the life and legacy of
		  Nelson Mandela on the occasion of the 95th anniversary of his
		  birth.

sponsor.#tail:
submitted
			 the following concurrent resolution; which was referred to the

text.#text:
Emancipation Hall in the Capitol Visitor
			 Center is authorized to be used on July 18, 2013, for a ceremony honoring the
			 life and legacy of Nelson Mandela on the occasion of the 95th anniversary of
			 his birth. Physical preparations for the ceremony shall be carried out in
			 accordance with such conditions as the

header.#text:
Use of Emancipation Hall for
			 ceremony honoring Nelson Mandela

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HCON 43 IH: Authorizing the use of Emancipation Hall in the Capitol Visitor Center for a ceremony honoring the life and legacy of Nelson Mandela on the occasion of the 95th anniversary of his birth.
